TheWyrmic:WyrmicUncommonSkill.NAME: Uncommon Skill
TheWyrmic:WyrmicUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

TheWyrmic:WyrmicRareSkill.NAME: Rare Skill
TheWyrmic:WyrmicRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
TheWyrmic:WyrmicRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

TheWyrmic:WyrmicRarePower.NAME: Rare Power
TheWyrmic:WyrmicRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

TheWyrmic:WyrmicAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
TheWyrmic:WyrmicAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !TheWyrmic:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

TheWyrmic:WyrmicSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
TheWyrmic:WyrmicSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !TheWyrmic:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

TheWyrmic:WyrmicVenomDrakeAspect.NAME: Venom Drake Aspect
TheWyrmic:WyrmicVenomDrakeAspect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Venom Drake Aspect. Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity.
